name: Dropping Toppings
description:
Couch Party Game!

Avoid the toppings to avoid becoming dinner!

Share a keyboard with a friend and see who can survive the longest as the intensity of falling toppings rises with time!

Controls:
Player1: WASD
Player2: Arrow Keys
Escape: Pause

Credits:
Programming: Zope
Art: MetricZero
Audio: Seanymack
